scripts.package: asar pack 'GRYT Skill Tracker-darwin-x64/GRYT Skill Tracker.app/Contents/Resources/app' 'GRYT Skill Tracker-darwin-x64/GRYT Skill Tracker.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar'
